comment: - SynchroniCity - Transportation / CrowdFlowObserved adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.Transportation/master/CrowdFlowObserved/schema.json

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: averageCrowdSpeed
contents.comment: Average speed of the crowd transiting during the observation period

contents.name: averageHeadwayTime
contents.comment:
Average headway time. Headway time is the time
    elapsed between two consecutive persons

contents.name: congested
contents.comment: Flags whether there was a crowd congestion during the observation period in the referred walkway. The absence of this attribute means no crowd congestion

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

contents.name: dateObserved
contents.comment: The date and time of this observation in ISO8601 UTC format. It can be represented by an specific time instant or by an ISO8601 interval. As a workaround for the lack of support of Orion Context Broker for datetime intervals, it can be used two separate attributes: `dateObservedFrom`, `dateObservedTo`

contents.name: dateObservedFrom
contents.comment: Observation period start date and time. See `dateObserved`

contents.name: dateObservedTo
contents.comment: Observation period end date and time. See `dateObserved`.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item

contents.name: occupancy
contents.comment: Fraction of the observation time where a person has been occupying the observed walkway

contents.name: peopleCount
contents.comment: Total number of people detected during this observation

contents.name: peopleCountAway
contents.comment: Total number of people detected during this observation away direction

contents.name: peopleCountTowards
contents.comment: Total number of people detected during this observation towards direction

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
